text: The 1936 Cincinnati Bearcats football team was an American football team that represented the University of Cincinnati as a member of the Buckeye Athletic Association during the 1936 college football season. In their second season under head coach Russ Cohen, the Bearcats compiled a 1–5–3 record. ==Schedule== ==References== Cincinnati Category:Cincinnati Bearcats football seasons Cincinnati football
title: 1936 Cincinnati Bearcats football team
